title: kandanai endanadu
sahitya:
(rAgA:  shrIranjani)  
  kandanai endanadu kanavinil kaNDadai undanukkippOdu uraippEnaDi tOzhi


anupallavi

  undaniDam uraippEn enda vidham en kAdalai kandan ak-kanavinil kavarndAn enbadaiyum

piDitten karangaLai piriyattODizhuttu eDuttennai aNaittAn idamura meduvAi
